title: Onna No Karada Ga Iya Nano De Mune O Torimashita
alternative_title: 女の体が嫌なので胸を取りました ; Onna no karada ga iyananode mune o torimashita ; I Hated My Female Body, so I Cut Off My Breasts
status: 女の体が嫌なので胸を取りました ; Onna no karada ga iyananode mune o torimashita ; I Hated My Female Body, so I Cut Off My Breasts
description:
Description :
        The author, who is non-binary (seeing themselves as neither male or female), chronicles their decision to have top surgery. 
Essays on the actual experience, from planning the surgery, to what happened afterwards.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 3: Causing A Small Ruckus

Vol.1 Chapter 0: Prologue: I Cut Off My Breasts
